general_advisory: It is recommended to sow wheat and maize during this period. Ensure proper ventilation for poultry.

advisory: Sow wheat seeds at the recommended spacing.
Provide adequate irrigation during the growth period.
Prepare the soil by plowing and adding nutrients.
Monitor for pests and diseases regularly.
Keep poultry houses clean and well-ventilated.
Provide proper nutrition to the poultry for healthy growth.
